meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she rewore her favorite dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: After washing his jeans, he rewore them the next day.
meanings.sent3: He rewore his lucky socks to the exam, hoping they would bring him good luck.
meanings.sent4: She rewore her smile, trying to hide her disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The idea of rewearing old memories brought a sense of comfort.

meanings.sent1: The actress rewore her stunning gown to another red carpet event.
meanings.sent2: He rewore his hiking boots for the mountain climb.
meanings.sent3: The superhero rewore his cape, ready to save the day once more.
meanings.sent4: She rewore her determination like a badge of honor.
meanings.sent5: The old clock rewore its ticking rhythm, filling the room with familiarity.
